thread.title: KC pitcher Guthrie remembers Oregon hometown after shooting
thread.title_full: KC pitcher Guthrie remembers Oregon hometown after shooting

title: KC pitcher Guthrie remembers Oregon hometown after shooting
text:
> Top News KC pitcher Guthrie remembers Oregon hometown after shooting Kansas City Royals pitcher Jeremy Guthrie, talks about growing up in Roseburg, Ore., where a gunman opened fire on students at Umpqua Community College near Roseburg today, before a baseball game between the Chicago White Sox and the Royals Thursday, Oct. 1, 2015, in Chicago. (AP Photo/Charles Rex Arbogast)
